title: How Long Does it Take to Get Pending Robux on Roblox?

steps.title: Pending Robux from community sales can take up to 30 days.
steps.content: Pending Robux from community sales can take up to 30 days. The amount of time depends on how much Robux is pending, but Roblox doesn't explicitly state the exact amounts and timeframes. Anecdotally, users have stated that their Robux were released after five days to two weeks. [1] X Research source However, as of April 2022, the pending period for Robux in escrow was increased to 30 days, [2] X Research source so you must wait at least 30 days before contacting Roblox about pending Robux. [3] X Research source If it's been over 30 days since a transaction and you still don't have your Robux, contact Roblox customer service by filling out the form on their website .

steps.title: Robux purchased from Roblox should be in your account in a few minutes.
steps.content: Robux purchased from Roblox should be in your account in a few minutes. Roblox doesn't state that there is any waiting time for Robux purchased directly from Roblox. If you don't get your Robux within an hour of purchase, contact Roblox customer service by filling out the form on their website . [4] X Research source

steps.title: Can I make pending Robux come faster?
steps.content: Can I make pending Robux come faster? There is no way to expedite the Robux pending process, since it is an anti-abuse and anti-fraud measure put in place by Roblox.

steps.title: Can pending Robux be cancelled?
steps.content: Can pending Robux be cancelled? No, pending Robux transactions cannot be cancelled . The only exception to this rule is if a charge was unauthorized. [5] X Research source

steps.title: How long will a specific amount of Robux take to pend?
steps.content: How long will a specific amount of Robux take to pend? According to Roblox, Robux transactions, in general, can take up to 30 days to pend. Anecdotally, users have found that the lower the amount of Robux in the transaction, the less time it takes to pendâ€”and the pending time is usually a few days to two weeks. Roblox does not have any specific information about how long certain amounts of Robux take to pend.
